New 2013 Volkswagen Passat Alltrack will debut at Tokyo Moto

http://www.automotortrends.com/volkswagen/2013-volkswagen-passat-alltrack-will-debut-at-tokyo-motor-show.html

New Volkswagen Passat car is Alltrack 2013, the beginnings of this machine in Tokyo Motor Show 2011. This new version is available in an estate car configuration and he closes the gap between the Passat Estate and viewed them as the Tiguan. A reason to be here: many drivers who use their car as a towing vehicle, or in situations of off-road light, want a versatile, very spacious and sports car that has rugged qualities. Volkswagen VW Passat Alltrack developed for this customer. In comparison with the familiar, the New Passat Estate model is defined by the bumper back in SUV-style with good wheel flares and side sill. Its greater ramp angle off route, approach angle, departure angle and ground clearance of the Volkswagen Passat Alltrack are a great alternative to driving on unpaved runways.

http://www.thecarstoday.com/2013-lexus-gs-450h-luxury-sport-sedan.html

Lexus hybrid technology constructor announced this with all-new 2013 Lexus GS 450 h, Lexus GS 450 h is the first Premium performance sedan in the world equipped with a V6 Atkinson cycle gasoline engine and two-hybrid system, the engine in front of the engine powered vehicle.With a total output of 230 hp system, Lexus GS 450 h will accelerate effortless 0-60 mph in 5.6 seconds. Instead, the fuel consumption should be increased by more than 30 percent. GS 450 h is certified as Super Ultra-low emission vehicles-low (SULEV II) II. GS Hybrid provides new voter Drive Mode. In addition to the Normal mode, the driver can personalize your experience of driving Eco mode, S, s Sport + Sport and EV.
